Free cash flow is the only sane way to value $MELI. Net income gets crushed by accounting noise â€” depreciation, provisions, conservative credit models â€” while the real engine is MercadoPagoâ€™s float spitting off cash like a broken ATM.

Net income tells you what the accountants think.
FCF tells you what the business actually earns.

Thatâ€™s why the gap is huge. And why FCF is the metric that matters.
